info.brief_description: I some how managed to be turned into a game character
info.description:
My name – tom
Age – 13
Hates – my two horrible, annoying brothers
Likes – card games, video games

One day Me and my best friend both win a gaming comp and are giving a box each with something inside, when I got home and opened the box, it was a transformation/gender machine. I dicided to test it out.
